Name: Blaston
About the game: Blaston is a competitive tactical workout where your survival hinges on simple rule: Never. Stay. Still. Experience all new ways to play in Blaston: Reloaded! Personalize your loadout with an all new weapons attachment system, take aim with a brand new weapon type, and arm yourself with the Cyber Bow from Apex Construct in our first ever exclusive collab with Fast Travel Games. Blaston Reloaded is our biggest update yet! Duck, dodge & weave like Neo as you duel players & bots to rise to the top League with your loadout assembled from collected weapons in this competitive slow-motion bullet-hell of endless skill & depth from Resolution Games. Features - Duel players in real-time from around the world Level-up to collect weapons of increasing depth Participate in officially hosted Blaston tournaments Create your own strategic weapon loadout Learn new tricks, add them to your strategy & play style Hang out in the Ozo Lounge - play arcade games, fist-bump to start a friendly duel, play darts & take photos to upload to Discord
Meta Title: Blaston: Dec 15, 2020, Resolution Games and Full Overview
